TASK: Craft an item of type: campfire
inventory=[{"type": "oak_sign", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 5, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 52, "index": 30}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 38, "index": 35}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 43}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a campfire, I need to craft sticks first. To craft a stick, I need to place 2 bamboo side by side in the crafting table. I will first move 1 bamboo from slot 20 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
